# NSTextField.BezelStyle

**Enumeration**

The style of bezel the text field displays.

## Declaration

```swift
enum BezelStyle
```

## Overview

Use [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFieldCell/bezelStyle] to set a text field’s bezel style.

## Constants

- **NSTextField.BezelStyle.squareBezel**: A style that draws a bezel with square corners around a text field.
- **NSTextField.BezelStyle.roundedBezel**: A style that draws a bezel with rounded corners around a single-line text field.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Controlling the Background

- **backgroundColor**: The color of the background the text field’s cell draws behind the text.
- **drawsBackground**: A Boolean value that controls whether the text field’s cell draws a background color behind the text.
- **isBezeled**: A Boolean value that controls whether the text field draws a bezeled background around its contents.
- **bezelStyle**: The text field’s bezel style, square or rounded.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
